item.title: I Gotta Go See About a Girl
item.description: Will Hunting has been gifted a prodigious brain. His mind is unlike anyone else’s before him. Yet instead of exercising his mental faculties to solve the next great mathematical challenges, he sets off for California in pursuit of the girl of his dreams. Will Hunting is a foolish man, right? Why would he throw away an opportunity of a lifetime, all for one girl? Well, what is more important for the soul - doing what one should do, or what one wants to do?
